title: (x) Ede and Ravenscroft script logo - hand lettered {Patricia}
content:
Hello - does anyone know which font is used in this picture?  
 [http://www.edeandravenscroft.co.uk/images/logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023007/http:/www.edeandravenscroft.co.uk/images/logo.gif "http://www.edeandravenscroft.co.uk/images/logo.gif")  
It might be custom but I really like the E.

Thanks in advance for your help!
author: dojr2

comments.content:
This has me stumped. Doesn't look like anything I have collected in the Script Font ID Guide. That 'E' is similar to the style in [Cancellaresca Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023007/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/cancellaresca-script/).

- Mike Yanega
I think it's handlettered - subtle differences in the few repeating characters.
I think you are right and it probably is handlettered... Pity!
